channel.title: [317]ERROR when adding last step to deathschaos9 highscore tutorial
channel.description:
when i added the past part into the client.java the one that you add to the logout to let it update highscores i got this error.
[code]client.java:15059: cannot find symbol symbol : variable SQL location: class client SQL.createConnection(); ^ client.java:15060: cannot find symbol symbol : variable SQL location: class client SQL.saveHighScore(this); ^ client.java:15061: cannot find symbol symbol : variable SQL location: class client SQL.destroyConnection(); ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
can anyone help me out on this error? please.
Bowzer.

item.title: [317]ERROR when adding last step to deathschaos9 highscore tutorial
item.dc:creator: @bowzer bowzer
item.description:
@bowzer wrote:

when i added the past part into the client.java the one that you add to the logout to let it update highscores i got this error.

client.java:15059: cannot find symbol symbol : variable SQL location: class client SQL.createConnection(); ^ client.java:15060: cannot find symbol symbol : variable SQL location: class client SQL.saveHighScore(this); ^ client.java:15061: cannot find symbol symbol : variable SQL location: class client SQL.destroyConnection(); ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .

can anyone help me out on this error? please.

Bowzer.
